synopsis.text: Sea monsters, marines, and a missing straw hat! The Straw Hat crew embarks on a thrilling 3D adventure in this original One Piece story. When Luffy's beloved hat disappears, the entire crew springs into action to track down the avian culprit. As they navigate the perilous waters, Usopp and Chopper stumble upon a lone, ailing pirate aboard a deserted ship. Bringing him aboard the Thousand Sunny for treatment, the crew must now juggle their new guest, the relentless pursuit of the marines, and a den of colossal sea creatures. Will they reclaim Luffy's hat and make it out of this marine-and-monster-filled chase unscathed? Join the Straw Hat pirates on this action-packed journey, premiering March 19th, 2011.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
